name: git-prl
description: CLI wrapper around git worktrees for running agents in parallel

scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npx ts-node tests/e2e/run-tests.ts
scripts.test:e2e:start: npm run build && npx ts-node tests/e2e/run-tests.ts start.test
scripts.test:e2e:apply: npm run build && npx ts-node tests/e2e/run-tests.ts apply.test

author: Scout CJ
